name: ReachTheGround
description:
Players starts at a height with platform generating beneath the player every delay.

Objective is to win by reaching the ground as player maneuvers the character guiding to reach the ground within the timer.

WASD - Movement

Arrow keys - Movement

Space - Jump

Mouse - Camera Control

R - Replay

G - Platform Generation Toggle

Y - Lights

H - Height Indicator

T - Timer

F - Toggle UI

Key Bindings :

Effects

1 - Fire Toggle

2 - Cloud Toggle

3 - Air Particles Toggle

Platforms

4 - Moss

5 - Glass

6 - Sky

7 - Fog

8 - Laser

9 - Water

Enjoy!!!!!!
